title: Paul Hollywood's ex Summer Monteys-Fullam in bid to turn family into Kardashians
text:

Paul Hollywood’s ex Summer Monteys-Fullam is on a mission to turn her family into the Kent Kardashians.

The name has been coined by friends who say she and her mum are focused on fame and fortune like the US family.

They say 24-year-old Summer’s life coach mother Sabina, 48, is behind the move.

“She sees herself as a Kris Jenner figure,” said one source, comparing Sabina to the self-styled mom-ager of the Kardashian dynasty, which includes daughters Kim, Khloe, Kourtney, Kylie and Kendall.

(Image: VIDEOGRRAB)

Sabina and Summer’s elder sister Saskia, 26, have been advising Summer on her new path.

“Sabina is steering Summer to stardom,” said the source. “Their nickname from friends, mainly towards the mum, eldest daughter Saskia and Summer are the Kent Kardashians.

“Sabina is now focussing on Summer and sees herself as a guide and a mentor to her achieving fame.”

(Image: JUSTIN LANE/EPA-EFE/REX)

(Image: SOPA Images/LightRocket via Gett)

The family plans have been hinted at in posts showing them living it up at the Ritz. They describe the swanky hotel as the “Monteys-Fullams’ favourite place” where they discuss “business plans, dreams, goals, prospects” over wine.

Another pic shows them all wearing Team Monteys clothes.

Sister Saskia owns a make-up business and often posts about her family, describing them as “strong, successful, independent women” and referring to mum as the Queen.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

(Image: GC Images)

Summer, who has two younger sisters, lives with her mum after her bitter split with Great British Bake Off judge Hollywood in August.

She has hinted at becoming an actress, saying: “I’m focusing on my career now, rather than dating. I’m enjoying being single.”

(Image: NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images)

Summer found fame after meeting Hollywood while working behind the bar in his local pub in Smarden, near Ashford in Kent.

She walked out of the £1million home they shared after nearly two years together when he asked her to sign a legal agreement not to talk about their relationship.
description: EXCLUSIVE: The ex-girlfriend of the Great British Bake Off star wants to turn her family into the Kardashians of Kent
